# ğŸ”« ğŸ”Š Flipper Keyller

**Flipper Keyller** is an app for the [Flipper Zero](https://flipperzero.one/) that emulates the iconic sounds of the classic 80s keychain: the **Echo Keyller** (also known as the **Executor Keychain**). This vintage gadget produced laser-like sounds when pressing its buttons â€” and now, you can carry that nostalgic experience right on your Flipper!


## ğŸ® Features

- ğŸµ 8 retro laser-style sound effects  
- ğŸ“Ÿ Simple, nostalgic interface  

## ğŸ“¦ Installation

Install directly from the official Flipper Zero app catalog.

| Button  | Action                  |
|---------|-------------------------|
| OK      | Play sound (pressed)              |
| â†/â†’/â†‘/â†“ | Switch sound type       |
| Back    | Exit                    |
